description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day – numerical (1-4)
presentation of the experiment to the participants – 8 trial of each condition per session
which condition the participants were presented first - unreliablefirst / reliablefirst
whether the participant turned their head in the same direction and tried to follow the gaze of the experimenter -  binary 1/0
number if looks to the same object as the experimenter was looking at
